EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2019.S1P Reg and CFP - 2/12/19
EmailTemplate.subject: Register for SpringOne Platform 2019 and Submit Your Proposals
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-reg-cfp-2019]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
After an unbelievable show in Washington, D.C., we’re getting ready to do it all again! Join us in Austin, TX, October 7–10, 2019, for SpringOne Platform 2019 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-reg-cfp-2019]]>, the premier conference for getting hands-on with modern software. This four-day event brings together leading software companies, enterprises, and cloud experts to collaborate, share knowledge, and create transformational software.
Save $600 off a standard conference pass Get in while the getting is good: Early Bird registration prices end on April 24, 2019 at 11:59pm (PDT). –> register now and save <[[https://springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-reg-cfp-2019]]> Call for proposals is now open If you have a software story to share with the world, we’d love to hear it. Join speakers from the world’s leading companies by submitting a talk <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/cfp?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-reg-cfp-2019]]> to SpringOne Platform by April 12, 2019 at 11:59pm (PDT). –> tell your story <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2019/cfp?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-reg-cfp-2019]]> Stay connected Join the conversation on Twitter with #SpringOne <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/springone]]>, and follow @S1P <[[https://twitter.com/s1p?lang=en]]> for news and updates.
I hope to see you there, Dormain
